document_data.name: ''Brooch of Shielding''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''brooch of shielding''''' was a magical protective device. A full-capacity brooch had a base value of 1,500 [[gp]].
document_data.Appearance: A ''brooch of shielding'' was a small piece of jewelry used to fasten a [[cloak]] or [[cape]]. They were often made of [[silver]] or [[gold]]. Most commonly, ''brooches of shielding'' were adorned with [[Mystra]]'s or [[Azuth]]'s ''[[holy symbol]]s.
document_data.Powers: A ''brooch of shielding'' could harmlessly absorb the force darts from a ''[[magic missile]]'' spell directed at the wearer. A single brooch could only absorb a set amount of energy before melting.

Notable Owners.Individuals: *[[Nayeli Goldflower]]: a [[paladin]] from the city of [[Daggerford]] and an adventurer who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
Notable Owners.Organizations: *[[Guardians of Daggerford]]: the guard organization from [[Daggerford]] who protected the lives of the city's Dukes. Members of the Guardians wore signature ''brooches of shielding'' in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
